description: The Penguins eliminated the Senators with a Chris Kunitz goal in double overtime.
title: Penguins advance to Stanley Cup Final with thrilling double-OT victory in Game 7 | FOX Sports

author: Craig CustanceESPN Senior Writer
description: Chris Kunitz's second goal of the game was the difference as the Penguins squeezed past the resilient Senators in double overtime. They now are four wins away from their second straight Stanley Cup finals win, but the Predators stand in their way.
title: Penguins barely sneak into finals
